title: ഈ ചെരിപ്പ് ഇടിമിന്നലേറ്റ് മരിച്ച കർഷകന്റേതാണോ …?
author: www.malayalam.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Extremely sorry for sharing this false photos. My son is a 3D artist and I show him the photos whenever I am in a doubt. This time it’s about a farmer and his slippers. This slippers can be of a Indian farmer. Hence I was very upset and shared these photos without much thinking. But I forgot after a lightening attack, these figures will be powder. This happened to a daily wage worker in our adjacent land at Kerala, when I was a school student some 50 years back.
